title: Forsaken Jayce Fanart Drawing
body: I love playing Jayce, so when the new Forsaken Jayce skin came out, I just had to draw it. So here it is, I hope people like it! O-o :3 <3 :D

replies.body: Your shading is awesome! I really love the pose, and how he feels like hes coming off the page. Nice work! ^-^
Thank you so much! Your words mean alot! :D

Very nice style you have.

It's a shame it's on notebook paper. You should consider picking up a pack of vellum paper.

Thanks! And yeah I've been getting that alot haha, but I've been doodling so much on notebook paper while in class, that it's become a medium that I've been comfortable working with :D. I should try vellum paper :o

Arms and legs flailing in every direction, you'd be perfect for league art team :)

Lol in all seriousness it's a nice piece of art.
Thank you! I was inspired by alot of the new splash arts :D
